pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5 2.4GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX750 or higher, AMD Radeon™ R7 260X or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX970 or higher AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or higher

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
